code: import React from"react";import"./Notifications.css";import closeIcon from'./close-icon.png';import{getLatestNotification}from'./utils';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Notifications(){const closeButtonClicked=()=>{console.log("Close button has been clicked");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Notifications",style:{border:'1px solid black',padding:'10px',position:'relative'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here is the list of notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{"aria-label":"Close",onClick:closeButtonClicked,style:{background:'none',border:'none',position:'absolute',right:'1.8rem',top:'2rem',cursor:'pointer'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:closeIcon,alt:"close icon",style:{width:'15px',height:'15px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"default",children:"New course available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",style:{color:'red'},children:"New resume available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:getLatestNotification()}})]})]});}export default Notifications;
